message: I didn't see anywhere in that article that the parents were spouting political nonsense to their child. Either way, it's the Santa's job to sit and smile..not to make ill mannered jokes.

Hera- You're the Queen of the Gods and the Goddess of marriage, women and birth. You are known to be temperamental but only to those who are unfaithful to you. They will get what they deserve, your revenge knows no limits! When you are not plotting against a traitor, you cherish and value the miracle of life, childbirth and hold onto your vows, who are extremely sacred to you. You are after all.. a Queen!
Or shoot 'er down.
